title.narrative: Cooperative Threat Reduction Program: Chemical Weapons Destruction [non-ODA]

description.narrative: Chemical Weapons Destruction (CWD) Program works with partner nations to reduce the threat from chemical weapons by securing and eliminating chemical weapon stockpiles and chemical agent research and production facilities, and mitigating proliferation risk of chemical weapon materials and expertise.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Special Operations Forces (SOF) Support Company

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to build the capacity of Libyas national military forces to conduct CT operations. It establishes an organic support company, which will provide logistics, supply, maintenance, and sustainment for two new SOF companies being created through the Global Security Contingency Fund. Equipment provided includes vehicles, radios, organizational clothing and personal equipment, weapons and ammunition, and medical equipment.
